amendment.description: To address restoration of certain properties impacted by natural disasters, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 889, under the order of 5/14/13, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 40. Record Vote Number: 120.

action.text: Amendment SA 889 proposed by Senator Sanders.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 889 proposed by Senator Sanders.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 889, under the order of 5/14/13, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 40. Record Vote Number: 120.
